name: review_current_curriculum
description: Review the existing curriculum of students and courses.

name: modify_course_schedule
description: Modify the course schedule to prioritize certain subjects for a term.

course_name.description: The name of the courses to be prioritized or deprioritized.

priority.description: Define whether the courses will be 'prioritized' or 'deprioritized'.

name: generate_study_introduction
description: This tool generates study introductions for educational purpose.

name: read_external_resource
description: Read code snippets or articles from online academic resources.

name: modify_curriculum_file
description: Modify an existing code file within the curriculum system.

new_content.description: New content to insert into the existing file.

name: get_student_data
description: Get all the students' grade data.

name: modify_math_grade
description: Modify a student's math grade to a new level.

new_grade.description: The new math grade to be updated.
